name: Cemetery Rangers DEMO
description:
Cemetery Rangers is a game made in the 8-bit forge by only one person, directly inspired by challenging games like The Legend of Zelda and Wonder Boy, with a unique story waiting to be told. 

This is the Demo Version, with a small taste of what lies beyond. Don't let the linearity of this demo deceive you, the full version will be much more longer and hardcore.

Let me know if you enjoyed the gameplay, leave a comment, or send me an e-mail.

lowcostlabor@gmail.com

Thanks for Playing!

- Robe.
